titles: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament directing the payment of all duties upon the revenue to be made to the severall receivers, appointed, or to be appointed.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: December 28. Printed for John Wright in the Old-Bailey,
notes: Dated at head: Die Sabbathi, 23. Decemb. 1643.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
